What Groups exist in the Village?

There are several groups in the village, such as the village council, the local gardening club, and the volunteer firefighters. We also have a group of regular customers at Hobbs Cafe who come in every day for their morning coffee. They have become like a community within the village, always chatting and catching up with each other while they wait for their orders. It's really heartwarming to see.
Do you feel as a member of a Group?

Yes, I absolutely feel like a member of a group at Hobbs Cafe. My customers have become like a family to me. We support each other, share stories and experiences, and create a friendly and welcoming atmosphere in the cafe. I also feel like a member of the wider village community, working together with other business owners and residents to make our village a better place. And of course, I am a member of the Hobbs Cafe team, working together with my staff to provide amazing food and service to our customers.
What interesting News did you hear from other Village residents recently?

I heard from one of my regular customers that the village council is planning to renovate the community park. They're asking for input and ideas from residents, so I can't wait to see what they come up with. And a couple who just moved to the village told me they are opening a new bakery in town next month. I'm excited to have another friendly business in the village community and can't wait to try their treats.
